description: This file is the client-entry point for a Remix application, responsible for hydrating the app on the client side using React. It imports necessary modules and starts the hydration process with React's startTransition and hydrateRoot functions.

methods.name: startTransition
methods.description: Wraps the hydration logic to ensure it runs smoothly without blocking the main thread.

methods.name: hydrateRoot
methods.description: Hydrates the React application into the DOM, replacing the existing static content with React-managed content.
